articles.content: Keke Palmer brought her sartorial A game to the world premiere of "Nope." The actress posed in a bold yet decidedly alluring ensemble from the Marc Jacobs fall 2022 collection. Putting her midsection… [+1306 chars]

articles.author: Eric Kohn
articles.title: Ethan Hawke: I’m at ‘the Beginning of My Last Act’ as an Actor - IndieWire
articles.description: In an extensive conversation with IndieWire, the actor explained the impulse behind his new docuseries "The Last Movie Stars" and his uneasy relationship to fame.
articles.content: At 51, Ethan Hawke has lived many creative lives. “Dead Poet’s Society” made him a star at 18; at 24 he became a Gen X icon with “Reality Bites.” He was 25 when “Before Sunrise” kicked off the iconic… [+19450 chars]
